cause.description:
Inter -All encompassing --- every Denomination that claims christ and his word, Spirit, Father, Divinity, Humanness.
1. Feed - supplies ie food time training...
2. We are not mini gods down here the glory power and strength of everything from science to love is by and through the trustworthy one .Our Creator.
3. Love - to the grieving and broken hearted
4. kindness in Humility
5. Personally standing at the foot of the throne of persecution and explainig my day
6. Humaness is our condition Purity is Higher then us but worth reaching for
cause.mission: Christianty ~ The Verb not just a Noun
cause.name: Christian Friends Network Alliance
